channel.title: AnInts
channel.description: I was wondering if someone could please tell me how Ints work for making new items in Class8.java of the client :\ what do the numbers mean? could someone perhaps make a tutorial? thanks in advance.

item.title: AnInts
item.dc:creator: @Nuke207 Nuke207
item.description:
@Nuke207 wrote:

thanks a heap mate!
also is anintarray156 and 160 needed? because if i make my own model I don’t get why i would want to recolor it :o

Read full topic

item.title: AnInts
item.dc:creator: @primadude Primadude
item.description:
@primadude wrote:

‘aStringArray189’ - This is the String array for the Right click options.
‘anIntArray156’ - This is For changing the colour of an item.
‘anIntArray160’ - This is For changing the secondary colour of an item.
‘anInt174’ - This is the Inventory model Id.
‘.anInt181’ - This is the zoom of the Inventory model, which means how big the model is in the inventory.
.anInt190’ - This is the model rotation (Up and down).
‘anInt198’ - This is the model rotation (Sideways).
‘anInt169’ - This is the model offset horizontally.
‘anInt194’ - This is the model offset Vertically.
‘anInt165’ - This is the male Wearing model.
‘anInt200’ - This is the female Wearing mode.
‘aString170’ This is the String array for the name of the Item.
aByteArray178’ - This is the examination of the Item.

Just spent like 5 mins on that so be appreciative lol.

Read full topic
